name: Deserted "Firefly Islands": Chronicles
description: This game is about a person who woke up in a laboratory and does not know what happened to her. Try to survive and save the universe. During the day, prepare for the night to survive the attacks of mutants who hunt people. Buy weapons and build defensive structures. Collect materials for construction. Buy a robot that will help you. Find transport or create your own to move faster. Complete missions and reveal the plot or simply travel around the islands in search of new things. Collect supplies and trade.
